channel.title: CVE Feed for Hikvision -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hikvision -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47487|2024-10-18T17:19:47.407Z -- hikvision -- hikcentral%20professional
item.description: There is a SQL injection vulnerability in some HikCentral Professional versions. This could allow an authenticated user to execute arbitrary SQL queries.

item.title: CVE-2024-47485|2024-10-18T13:45:44.086Z -- hikvision -- hikcentral%20master%20lite
item.description: There is a CSV injection vulnerability in some HikCentral Master Lite versions. If exploited, an attacker could build malicious data to generate executable commands in the CSV file.

item.title: CVE-2024-47485|2024-10-18T08:29:38.392Z -- hikvision -- hikcentral%20master%20lite
item.description: There is a CSV injection vulnerability in some HikCentral Master Lite versions. If exploited, an attacker could build malicious data to generate executable commands in the CSV file.

item.title: CVE-2024-47487|2024-10-18T08:32:45.182Z -- hikvision -- hikcentral%20professional
item.description: There is a SQL injection vulnerability in some HikCentral Professional versions. This could allow an authenticated user to execute arbitrary SQL queries.

item.title: CVE-2024-47486|2024-10-18T08:33:07.095Z -- hikvision -- hikcentral%20master%20lite
item.description: There is an XSS vulnerability in some HikCentral Master Lite versions. If exploited, an attacker could inject scripts into certain pages by building malicious data.

item.title: CVE-2024-47486|2024-10-18T14:36:32.672Z -- hikvision -- hikcentral%20master%20lite
item.description: There is an XSS vulnerability in some HikCentral Master Lite versions. If exploited, an attacker could inject scripts into certain pages by building malicious data.
